dcterms:creator: C. Resnick
W. Eldridge
D. Ha
D. Britz
J. Foerster
J. Togelius
K. Cho
J. Bruna
dcterms:description: The Pommerman environment is based off of the classic console game Bomberman, featuring a two-player game where agents can execute various actions such as moving, staying put, or placing bombs. The environment is characterized by sparse and delayed rewards, making it a challenging benchmark for reinforcement learning methods.
dcterms:title: Pommerman

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
K. Kavukcuoglu
D. Silver
A. A. Rusu
J. Veness
M. G. Bellemare
A. Graves
M. Riedmiller
A. K. Fidjeland
G. Ostrovski
dcterms:description: Atari games serve as a benchmark for deep reinforcement learning, where agents learn to play various games directly from raw pixel inputs, demonstrating human-level control through deep reinforcement learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Atari games

dcterms:creator: OpenAI
dcterms:description: DOTA 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena game used as a benchmark for reinforcement learning, where agents learn to play the game through self-play and competition against other agents.
dcterms:title: DOTA 2

dcterms:creator: OpenAI
dcterms:description: Montezuma’s Revenge is a classic platform game used as a benchmark for reinforcement learning, particularly focusing on learning from sparse rewards and requiring agents to learn complex strategies from limited demonstrations.
dcterms:title: Montezuma’s Revenge
